topic.title: Occupation Industry History Observation - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:2182)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:2183)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="21844-6" Industry Hx (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:2185)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 HL7ActStatus) (CONF:2187)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:2188)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1100 Industry STATIC, where its data type is CD (CONF:2189)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:2182)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:2183)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="21844-6" Industry Hx (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:2185)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 HL7ActStatus) (CONF:2187)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:2188)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1100 Industry STATIC, where its data type is CD (CONF:2189)
